front.title: MIME Encapsulation of Macintosh Files - MacMIME

author.organization: Royal Institute of Technology, Department of Numerical Analysis and Computing Science
Apple Computer Inc., Engineering Computer Operations

abstract.t: This memo describes the format to use when sending Apple Macintosh files via MIME. The format is compatible with existing mechanisms for distributing Macintosh files, while allowing non-Macintosh systems access to data in standardized formats.
